notes: UFH zones (x4) set for max 25C slab temp; radiators and MVHR duct heater are 'open'. Passivhaus Institute certified Low-Energy Building. F1145 GSHP compressor uses old-school on/off control rather than a variable-speed inverter drive. GSHP schedule is 'blocked' 16:00 - 19:15. Since the diverter valve is inside the GSHP unit casing (hence separate output pipes for DHW and CH) there are two heat meters, one for each 'flow' circuit. DHW versus CH is inferred by comparing the flow rates from the meters.

notes: Optimised for operational cost, not CoP. Mixergy tank too small so boosted from ~50 to 65C with immersion and protected by TMV to boost capacity.  Octopus installed a 11kW HP rather than 9kW as specified, kept it as useful for integration for Intelligent Octopus additional off-peak slots, or Octopus Power-up sessions. Running at delta 5C flow/return target. Data sourced from ESPAltherma M5StickC-plus on the X10 of the unit and myenergi CT clamp on the heat pump power cable. Installed September 2022. Filter/strainer cleaned out November 13 '23 and max flow jumped from 24l/m to 30l/m. Second filter on Flow removed in October '24 by Octopus as not required, max flow jumped another few l/s. Jumper removed in November '24 to stop tape heaters coming on above 6C when in LWT mode and no compressor on but circulation only. Daikin Altherma 3M EDLA11DA3V3 - As of December 11 2023, reporting using the "Leaving Water after BUH R2T" sensor

notes: Model EDLA06E2V3, 10mm copper drops to radiators ,9kw HP swapped with a 6Kw at beginning of Nov 24 , currently experimenting so the hp does not do hot water cycles when temps are below 0 degree C in a effort to try and stop defrost cycles, the design temps from octopus -50 @ 2,7 degrees C was way out, at minus two i am only needing a flow temp of around 31-32 degrees C, so the original design has caused issues with the wrong heat pump originally being fitted and putting this right has increased the performance
